Name: content_type
Description: Content types published from this source

Name: country
Description: Shortcut for country - defaults to country.name

Name: country.id
Description: Id for country used by ReliefWeb

Name: country.iso3
Description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 code

Name: country.name
Description: Name of the country in English where the source headquarters is located

Name: country.primary
Description: Flag to indicate this is the primary country

Name: country.shortname
Description: Short name of the country in English where the source headquarters is located

Name: date
Description: Shortcut for date - defaults to date.created

Name: date.changed
Description: Date entry modified on ReliefWeb (ISO 8601)

Name: date.created
Description: Date entry created on ReliefWeb (ISO 8601)

Name: description
Description: Description of the source in Markdown format

Name: description-html
Description: Description of the source in HTML format

Name: disclaimer
Description: Disclaimer information

Name: fts_id
Description: Id number for organization used by FTS

Name: homepage
Description: URL of organization

Name: id
Description: Unique id for source used by ReliefWeb

Name: logo
Description: Shortcut for logo - defaults to logo.url

Name: logo.filename
Description: File name of the logo

Name: logo.filesize
Description: File size of the logo

Name: logo.height
Description: Height of the logo

Name: logo.id
Description: Id for logo used by ReliefWeb

Name: logo.mimetype
Description: MIME type of the logo

Name: logo.url
Description: URL of the logo

Name: logo.width
Description: Width of the logo

Name: longname
Description: Official name of source, where applicable

Name: name
Description: Name of source

Name: shortname
Description: Name of the source in abbreviated format, where applicable

Name: spanish_name
Description: Name of the source in Spanish

Name: status
Description: Whether source is active or not

Name: type
Description: Shortcut for type of organization - defaults to type.name

Name: type.id
Description: Id of organization type used by ReliefWeb

Name: type.name
Description: Link for values

Name: url
Description: Canonical url

Name: url_alias
Description: Friendly' url of the source
